serviceUrl.description: Rest service URL of the data source

keyAttribute.description: Primary key of the data collection returned by rest service

collectionDataSource.description: CollectionTableDataSouce object which is data source of result table/list view

collectionData.description: oj.Collection object which is data source of result table/list view

columnsList.description: List of columns to be shown in result section

facetList.description: List of filters <JsonData, filterType, keyAttribute>. user should pass json data, filter type i.e. checkbox, choicelist, link etc and keyAttribute

keywordSearchAttribute.description: Attribute on which keyword search will be executed

toggleFilterHandler.description: Toggle filter panel of faceted search
